Subjects: prayers, to saints; John the Evangelist, saint, prayer to
_description: A prayer to St. John — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘To almyghty God pray for pees / Amice christi lohannes’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
O glorius Iohan euangelysteBest be louyd with ihesu
                    cryst…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Sayyng ozanna to þe trinyteper seculorum
                    secula

Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.
